chinese: 几，命运，天数，天命
english: destiny

chinese: 公主亲了青蛙，然后它变成了王子，这一切都是宿命。
english: It was destiny that she would kiss the frog and it would become the prince

chinese: n.排；陈列；编队 V排列；部署
english: array

chinese: 我对着一排空座位讲课！
english: I was lecturing to an array of empty seats

chinese: adj.类似的，比得上的，可比较的
english: comparable

chinese: 这两条狗在大小和强壮程度方面都不相上下。
english: The two dogs are comparable in size and strength

chinese: n大块；矮而厚的木块；大量
english: chunk

chinese: 晚饭我只烹饪这一大块肉。
english: I will just cook this big chunk of meat for dinner

chinese: n.手稿；底稿；手抄本
english: manuscript

chinese: 这是一位著名作家的手稿。
english: This is the manuscript of a famous writer

chinese: n.短缺，不足
english: shortage

chinese: 这个孩子正面临水的短缺。
english: The child is having a shortage of water

chinese: 几.存货清单；详细目录
english: inventory

chinese: 仓库管理员正在为所有存货做一份清单。
english: The storekeeper is making an inventory of all stock

chinese: adj.隐喻的
english: metaphorical

chinese: 男女之间存在的鸿沟是性别差异的隐喻。
english: The gap between men and women is a metaphorical representation of gender differences

chinese: 几. 走廊，回廊，通道；狭长地带
english: corridor

chinese: 医生和护士在走廊里谈话。
english: The doctors and nurses are talking in the corridor

chinese: 以.创新，改革
english: innovate

chinese: 乔布斯成功地对智能手机的样式进行了创新。
english: Jobs succeeded in innovating the style of smart mobile phones

chinese: n.脆弱
english: fragility

chinese: 玻璃的一个主要缺点是易碎。
english: A major drawback of glass is its fragility

chinese: n，半身塑像 V.打碎；搜捕 ad）破产的
english: bust

chinese: 这尊毕达哥拉斯半身像是用来纪念这位伟大的古希腊数学家的。
english: The bust of Pythagoras honors the great Greek mathematician

chinese: 几通道，走廊；
english: passage

chinese: 人们提着箱子正从通道里走过。
english: People with suitcases are walking through the passage

chinese: n.算术；计算
english: arithmetic

chinese: 那个小男孩在写算术作业。这对他来说很容
english: The boy is doing arithmetic homework. It's easy for him

chinese: ad），不考虑的，不顾的
english: irrespective

chinese: 书店应该对每个人开放，不管他们是富裕还是
english: Bookstores should be open to everyone, irrespective of whether they are rich or poor

chinese: n.男性（气概）
english: masculinity

chinese: 发达的肌肉是展现男子气概的方式之一。
english: Strong muscles are one way to prove a man's masculinity
